MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan, affecting properties in Fernlea Crescent and surrounding areas We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.10pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50pm on Wednesday, 17 February 2021
